version_description:
1. Updates to reflect changes in train company names.
2. Fixes to the Twitter feed and alerts.
3. Other minor bug fixes.

1. Updates to reflect changes in train company names.
2. Fixes to the Twitter feed and alerts.
3. Other minor bug fixes.

This release contains:

- Improvements to the presentation of information for passengers travelling with cycles

- Minor bug fixes

This release contains:

- Improvements to the presentation of information for passengers travelling with cycles

- Minor bug fixes

- There are some changes to the names of train companies included in this release:

o East Coast becomes Virgin Trains East Coast
o Virgin Trains becomes Virgin Trains West Coast
o Creation of a new train company – Caledonian Sleeper (will start running trains from April 1st)

- Two new stations are available for journey planning:

o Gosport (by ferry)
o Pye Corner

- There are some changes to the names of train companies included in this release:

o East Coast becomes Virgin Trains East Coast
o Virgin Trains becomes Virgin Trains West Coast
o Creation of a new train company – Caledonian Sleeper (will start running trains from April 1st)

- Two new stations are available for journey planning:

o Gosport (by ferry)
o Pye Corner

We're really excited to announce our first release to enable you to get live train information on the Apple Watch.

As well as live train information, you can find your nearest station and also set personal delay and disruption notifications.

We're really excited to announce our first release to enable you to get live train information on the Apple Watch.

As well as live train information, you can find your nearest station and also set personal delay and disruption notifications.

Updates to Stations Information.

We apologise if you are experiencing problems with the app, thank you for all of your feedback. We are listening and working on fixes. We appreciate your patience and will be releasing updates soon.

Updates to Stations Information.

We apologise if you are experiencing problems with the app, thank you for all of your feedback. We are listening and working on fixes. We appreciate your patience and will be releasing updates soon.

We have been working hard on bug fixes and improving stability. We have fixed the bug which sometimes told you that you were offline. We have also looked at fixing finding your nearest station and entering station names. You are now also able to view a previous train after it has departed and much more. This release has been tested on iOS9. We are aware of the lack of platform information for stations serviced by SouthEastern and South West Trains – this is an industry data issue that we working with our partners on resolving.

We apologise if you are experiencing any problems with the app, thank you for all of your feedback. We are listening and continue to work on fixes. We appreciate your patience and will be releasing updates soon.

Please feel free to email us on app_customer_services@nationalrail.co.uk with your feedback.

Please feel free to email us on app_customer_services@nationalrail.co.uk with your feedback.

In this release, we have been working to make the app run much smoother and it should now be running with less crashes. Thanks for all of your feedback so far.
Please feel free to email us at app_customer_services@nationalrail.co.uk

The previous release (9.1) had an issue when upgrading. This is an urgent bug fix to resolve this. If you have already installed 9.1 please upgrade to this version. If you are still facing an issue you can uninstall the app and re-install from the app store.

We apologise for the inconvenience, mistakes sometimes happen.

The previous release (9.1) had an issue when upgrading. This is an urgent bug fix to resolve this. If you have already installed 9.1 please upgrade to this version. If you are still facing an issue you can uninstall the app and re-install from the app store.

We apologise for the inconvenience, mistakes sometimes happen.
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
This release fixes a few bugs in the Background + updated twitter links and new railway stations added.
This release fixes a few bugs in the Background + updated twitter links and new railway stations added.

In this release we have:
•updated the recent franchise change, Avanti West Coast replaces Virgin Trains.
•Added Robroyston, Meridian Water, Worcester parkway, Warrington West, Maghull North stations that opened recently.
•Added the new 16-17 saver discount product.
•Update the our T&C's to include third party licencing information
•Plus some general backend bug fixes.

In this release we have:
•updated the recent franchise change, Avanti West Coast replaces Virgin Trains.
•Added Robroyston, Meridian Water, Worcester parkway, Warrington West, Maghull North stations that opened recently.
•Added the new 16-17 saver discount product.
•Update the our T&C's to include third party licencing information
•Plus some general backend bug fixes.
Improve security changes and bugs fixes that include the App working correctly in Dark Mode.
Improve security changes and bugs fixes that include the App working correctly in Dark Mode.
In this release we’ve added some new stations, fixed a few bugs including a workaround for our integrated twitter feed and updated our backend SDK’s.
In this release we’ve added some new stations, fixed a few bugs including a workaround for our integrated twitter feed and updated our backend SDK’s.
We’ve added the new Veteran’s railcard, a new station and have updated our Cycle policy, as well a few bug fixes.
We’ve added the new Veteran’s railcard, a new station and have updated our Cycle policy, as well a few bug fixes.
In this release we have updated webview to comply with Apple’s guidelines plus general bug fixes.
In this release we have updated webview to comply with Apple’s guidelines plus general bug fixes.
In this release we have added a new station (Bow street) and fixed an issue with push notifications (Rail Disruption alerts for delays and cancellations showing on the app). + other small bug fixes.
In this release we have added a new station (Bow street) and fixed an issue with push notifications (Rail Disruption alerts for delays and cancellations showing on the app). + other small bug fixes.
In this release we have added a new season calculator function to plan and look up season ticket prices including the new flexible season tickets now on offer. Plus some minor Bug fix’s.
In this release we have added a new season calculator function to plan and look up season ticket prices including the new flexible season tickets now on offer. Plus some minor Bug fix’s.
